snippet: The killing of Lee Rigby has shocked Britain as few things have in recent years, with the political reverberations continuing for the government of Prime Minister David Cameron.
abstract: Political reverberations from brutal murder of off-duty soldier Lee Rigby include concerns about failure of Britain's domestic security agency MI5 and debate over whether government has taken sufficient action to curb terrorism; bill to widen government’s counterterrorism powers was dropped from legislative agenda to avoid straining ties between Conservatives and Liberal Democrats, who say measure is too invasive.
lead_paragraph: The killing of Lee Rigby has shocked Britain as few things have in recent years, with the political reverberations continuing for the government of Prime Minister David Cameron.

headline.seo: Grief and Political Reverberations After British Soldier’s Killing
headline.main: Wave of Grief and Political Reverberations Grip Britain After Soldier’s Killing
headline.print_headline: Wave of Grief and Political Reverberations Grip Britain After Soldier’s Killing
